product_name: GORE BIKE WEAR Power GT AS Bike Jacket - Men's
long_description: Are you an ambitious year-round road cyclist? The GORE BIKE WEAR Power GT AS bike jacket for men delivers waterproof, highly breathable yet lightweight protection for rides of several hours or more. Gore-Tex(R) Active Shell nylon fabric is engineered to be extremely breathable for highly aerobic activities, yet is waterproof and windproof. Lightweight, classic design packs down small. Preshaped elbows provide a natural fit and superior movement. Adjustable cuffs seal out weather; dropped tail adds coverage. Back stow pocket has a waterproof phone/media pocket. GORE BIKE WEAR Power GT AS bike jacket for men offers reflective trim front and back.
short_description: Are you an ambitious year-round road cyclist? The GORE BIKE WEAR Power GT AS bike jacket for men delivers waterproof, highly breathable yet lightweight protection for rides of several hours or more.
